CustomField.description: Indicates the sort order of the Maintenance Work Rule Template. Sort Order sets the precedence that determines how work orders are generated when a Maintenance Plan or Maintenance Asset has two or more maintenance work rules generating a work order for the same date. The lowest sort order value takes precedence. This field’s Sort Order will be mapped to the Maintenance Work Rule created based on the Template.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the sort order of the Maintenance Work Rule Template. Sort Order sets the precedence that determines how work orders are generated when a Maintenance Plan or Maintenance Asset has two or more maintenance work rules generating a work order for the same date. The lowest sort order value takes precedence. This field’s Sort Order will be mapped to the Maintenance Work Rule created based on the Template.
CustomField.label: Sort Order
